Service Details: - Relieves poverty in developing nations by providing food and other basic supplies to persons in need and establishing small scale farming programs to provide food security and promote self-sufficiency- Programs include reproductive health for women and girls, Empowering the Mother, Educational Sponsorship, and the Livelihood project- Volunteer opportunities are available
